document.full_text: the chinese government warned on tuesday against using human rights disputes as what it called a tool to meddle, ahead of talks with the united states that will focus on complaints about beijing's crackdown on dissent.
document.title: china warns against "interference" ahead of u.s. rights talks
lines_and_colors: the chinese government warned on tuesday against using human rights disputes as what it called a tool to meddle, ahead of talks with the united states that will focus on complaints about beijing's crackdown on dissent.
